game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, the fabric of reality is threatened by a mysterious force known as 'The Devourer'. This entity feeds on the collective memories of humanity, erasing entire civilizations from existence. Players take on the role of a gifted memory hunter, tasked with uncovering the truth behind The Devourer's origins and stopping its destructive path.
game.beginning: The game begins in the city of Remembrance, where the player's character is approached by a cryptic figure known only as 'The Archivist'. This enigmatic individual possesses knowledge of The Devourer's existence and sets the player on a quest to gather memories from across the world, which hold the key to understanding the true nature of this threat.
game.ending: As the player delves deeper into the mysteries of The Devourer, they uncover a shocking truth: the entity is not a mindless monster, but a symptom of humanity's own dark past. In the end, the player must confront their own memories and the collective guilt of human history to find a way to stop The Devourer and restore balance to the fabric of reality.
